|flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = |ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;KVR16S11S6/2; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;B50280C1;B50280C1KFBG; |stockos = Linux;3.4.27-UBNT;EdgeOS; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SFP |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sfp_num = 2 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 110-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_conn = C5 |serial = yes,, console port (RJ45),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2 |specialfeat = |flags = 2x SFP/RJ45 Combo port |addchip = 16Mbit SPI Serial Flash;cFeon;QH16-104HIP;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, PCIe 3.0 Clock Generator with 1 HCSL Outputs;Pericom;P16C557;;1;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;4;,,, 1MHz, 2.0A, Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;6;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AO4566;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;Unisonic Tech;UT4392G;;1;,,, 3-State Quad Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;74LVC125A;;6;,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;4;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = ubnt |defaultpass = ubnt |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 810354020636 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = 9SIAJ7W8HW5173 |asin = B00IA5J8M8 |asin_country = US |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{seealso|Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Series}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.ubnt.com/downloads/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_DS.pdf Datasheet] *[https://www.ubnt.com/downloads/guides/edgemax/EdgeOS_UG.pdf User's Guide] *[https://www.ubnt.com/downloads/guides/edgemax/EdgeRouter_ERPro-8_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/32398-ubiquiti-edgemax-edgerouter-pro-reviewed ''EdgeRouter PRO'' reviewed on '''SNB'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/ubiquiti/ubiquiti_edgerouter_pro_erpro-8 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/edgerouter_pro |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = octeon |subtarget = generic |arch = mips64_octeon |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Notes== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=176157 ''EdgeRouter LITE/PRO'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums]

*[https://community.ubnt.com/t5/EdgeMAX/EdgeRouter-Pro-CPU/td-p/654599 ''EdgeRouter PRO CPU'' on '''UBNT''' forums] :*e50 : (X/X-SFP) : @880MHz dual core MIPS1004KEc without offload ::CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT (with HNAT, QOS and others features from the SDK) :*e100/e110 (USG/LITE/POE) : @500MHz dual core MIPS64 with offload ::CPU: [[Cavium]] Octeon Plus CN5020-500SCP :*e200 (ER-8/PRO) : 800MHz / 1GHz dual core MIPS64 with offload ::CPU: [[Cavium]] Octeon II [http://cavium.com/OCTEON-II_CN61XX.html CN6120]-800SCP/1000SCP (1MB L2 cache) *[https://community.ubnt.com/t5/EdgeMAX/EdgeRouter-Pro-RAM-Upgrade/td-p/653451 ''EdgeRouter Pro - RAM Upgrade'' on '''UBNT''' forums] :RAM: 2GB (DDR3-1333 SO-DIMM), upgrade to 4/8GB DDR3 (Samsung)
